CyanobotsGenes.XenotypeGeneTemplateDef.label: metamorphosis: {0}
CyanobotsGenes.XenotypeGeneTemplateDef.description: Carriers of this gene carry a latent copy of an entirely separate genome. At puberty (13) they will metamorphose permanently into the other xenotype.

CyanobotsGenes.XenotypeGeneTemplateDef.label: offspring: {0}
CyanobotsGenes.XenotypeGeneTemplateDef.description: Carriers of this gene carry an entirely separate genome in their gametes. As a result, their offspring will be of a different xenotype to the parent.

CyanobotsGenes.XenotypeGeneTemplateDef.label: implant {0} xenogerm
CyanobotsGenes.XenotypeGeneTemplateDef.description: Carriers store a copy of an entirely separate xenogerm in a specialised implantation organ. Every 20 days they can implant this stored xenogerm into another person, overwriting any existing xenogerm.
